delete.description: Deleting your account cannot be undone after this. All conversations from the account will be deleted.
delete.title: Delete account

email.info: Providing an email address allows you to recover your password later. Your email address will not be used for other purposes.
email.label: Email

password.label: Password
password.tooltip: Your password has to be at least 8 characters long.

displayName.label: Display name
displayName.info: If you want to remain anonymous to mentors, enter a display name that does not identify you.
displayName.tooltip: Your username has to be at least 2 characters long.

mentor.mandatoryNotice: Fields marked with a star * are required.

vacation.info: During vacation mode, you cannot receive messages. Please specify the duration of your vacation in your status message.
vacation.title: Vacation mode
